opis: EKSKLUZIVNA LOKACIJA, RIJETKOST NA TRŽIŠTU Predivan apartman s 4 sobe , 2 kupaone , kuhinja 2 spremišta , dnevni boravak plus kuhinja 216m2 Direktno uz more 5 m. Ovaj luksuzni apartman čeka na vas U srcu Jadrana naš prelijepi apartman 5 m od plaže u Privlaci, Zadar, Hrvatska prodaje se. Pri ulasku očekuju vas četiri spavaće sobe, kuhinja sa trpezarijom dnevna soba i dva moderna kupatila. Apartman je potpuno opremljen i namješten. Terasa s velikim vrtom nudi brojne ugodne večeri na roštilju s panoramskim pogledom na more. Dupla garaža nudi dovoljno prostora za vaš automobil. PRIVLAKA-ZADAR je općina u Zadarskoj županiji u Hrvatskoj poznato turističko mjesto.Privlaka je smještena na prostranom, ravnom poluotoku pjeskovitog tla (7 km dužine i 4 km širine) koji sa sjeveroistočne strane zatvara Ninski zaljev, a s jugozapadne Zadarski kanal. Od Nina je udaljena 2 km, a od Zadra je udaljena 18 km. Odlikuje se blagom mediteranskom klimom s 2.540 sunčanih sati godišnje. Položaj Privlake značajan je utoliko što se u njenoj blizini nalazi kraljevski grad Nin (2 km) te Park prirode Velebit (50 km) i Nacionalni park Paklenica (30 km Više informacija na 095 829 1188 ili geofly.immobilien@gmail.com ENG EXCLUSIVE LOCATION, RARE ON THE MARKET Beautiful apartment with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen 2 storage rooms, living room plus kitchen 216m2 Directly by the sea 5 m. This luxury apartment is waiting for you In the heart of the Adriatic, our beautiful apartment 5 m from the beach in Privlaka, Zadar, Croatia is for sale. Upon entering, you will find four bedrooms, a kitchen with a dining room, a living room and two modern bathrooms. The apartment is fully equipped and furnished. The terrace with a large garden offers many pleasant barbecue evenings with panoramic sea views. A double garage offers enough space for your car. PRIVLAKA-ZADAR Privlaka is located on a spacious, flat peninsula of sandy soil (7 km long and 4 km wide) which closes the Gulf of Nin on the northeast side and the Zadar Channel on the southwest. It is 2 km away from Nin, and 18 km away from Zadar. It is characterized by a mild Mediterranean climate with 2,540 hours of sunshine a year. The position of Privlaka is significant in that it is close to the royal town of Nin (2 km) and the Velebit Nature Park (50 km) and the Paklenica National Park (30 km).
